docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs
docs.text: For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: CML Installation
docs.text:
In order to get CML working on VMWare Workstation on a Ryzen CPU, you can try the following steps and references:

Do make sure to enable the virtualization option for your CPU in the BIOS. How to do this depends on the motherboard and CPU model if it is capable but the configurations are similar. Intel uses VT-x/EPT and AMD uses AMD-V/RVI/SMV.

References

Fix for AMD Virtualization (AMD-V/SMV)

Installation Guide Note: Select the appropriate CML version guide

Fix for "No PCIe Slot available for Ethernet0" error

docs.title: Virtualization Issue
docs.text:
This error occurs when first running the CML as a VM. When the memory, storage, cpu, OS, and reference ISOs are set, Virtualization with AMD CPUs can cause problems. See workarounds below:

Do the following one by one and test if CML can run:

Option 1

  1. Turn off Memory Integrity protection in Windows Security > Core Isolation. Don't restart yet.
  2. Open the Run dialog box by pressing Win key + R and type optionalfeatures. Turn off the following by unchecking:
    • Hyper-V and all its subfeatures
    • Windows Hypervisor platform
    • Virtual Machine Platform
    • Windows Sandbox.
  3. Restart your device.

Option 2

  1. Open Command Prompt as an administrator and execute the command bcdedit /set hypervisorlaunchtype off.
  2. Open the local Group policy editor and go to Computer Configuration > Administrative Templates > System > Device Guard. Open Turn on Virtualization Based Security and toggle it to disabled. Restart your device.

The fix from the broadcom link includes a third option that utilizes a tool from Microsoft itself. You can check it if methods above did not work.

• Execute [[Common Configs]].
enable
conf t
clock timezone UTC +8
clock summer-time PH recurring last Sun Mar 2:00 last Sun Oct 3:00

enable algorithm-type scrypt secret Skill39@Manila
username admin privilege 15 algorithm-type scrypt secret Skill39@Manila

no ip domain-lookup

ip domain-name wsa2025.net
crypto key generate rsa modulus 2048
ip ssh version 2

line console 0
login local
exec-timeout 0 0
line vty 0 4
login local
exec-timeout 0 0
logging synchronous
transport input ssh

end
write memory
  • Configure [[L2 Services#VLAN Trunking Protocol|VTP]].
enable
conf t
vtp mode off
vtp domain WSA2025
end
wr
  • Configure [[Cisco Environment#VLANs|VLANs]] and set [[Cisco Environment#IP Configuration|IP configuration]].
enable
conf t

vlan 100
name SERVER
vlan 101
name CLIENT_1
vlan 102
name CLIENT_2
vlan 103
name MGMT
exit

int vlan 100
no sh
int vlan 101
no sh
int vlan 102
no sh
int vlan 103
no sh
ip add 10.1.103.1 255.255.255.0
exit
end
wr
  • Configure g0/1 as access port.
enable
conf t

int g0/1
no sh
switchport mode access
switchport access vlan 101

end
wr
  • Configure g0/0 as trunk port.
en
conf t

int g0/0
switchport trunk encapsulation dot1q
switchport mode trunk

end
wr

  • Configure EIGRP.
en
conf t

router eigrp WSA2025
address-family ipv4 autonomous-system 100
eigrp router-id 10.10.0.21

network 10.10.0.21 0.0.0.0
network 10.1.100.0 0.0.3.255
network 172.16.100.0 0.0.0.255

network 10.1.100.0 0.0.0.255
network 10.1.101.0 0.0.0.255
network 10.1.102.0 0.0.0.255
network 10.1.103.0 0.0.0.255

af-interface default
passive-interface
exit
af-interface tun0
no passive-interface
summary-address 10.1.100.0/22

end
wr
  • Configure NHRP. Peering only happens
enable
conf t

# Static route for discovering HQ1 and HQ2
ip route 192.0.2.96 255.255.255.240 192.0.2.1
ip route 192.0.2.192 255.255.255.240 192.0.2.1

interface tun0
ip nhrp authentication WSA2025
ip nhrp network-id 2025
ip nhrp map multicast 192.0.2.202
ip nhrp map 172.16.100.1 192.0.2.202
ip nhrp nhs 172.16.100.1

# phase 3
ip nhrp shortcut
tunnel source g0/0
tunnel mode gre multipoint

end
wr

enable
conf t

ip dhcp excluded-address 10.1.101.1 10.1.101.100
ip dhcp pool VLAN101
network 10.1.101.0 255.255.255.0
default-router 10.1.101.10

end
wr

docs.title: Config
docs.text:
• Execute [[Common Configs]].
enable
conf t
clock timezone UTC +8
clock summer-time PH recurring last Sun Mar 2:00 last Sun Oct 3:00

enable algorithm-type scrypt secret Skill39@Manila
username admin privilege 15 algorithm-type scrypt secret Skill39@Manila

no ip domain-lookup

ip domain-name wsa2025.net
crypto key generate rsa modulus 2048
ip ssh version 2

line console 0
login local
exec-timeout 0 0
line vty 0 4
login local
exec-timeout 0 0
logging synchronous
transport input ssh

end
write memory
  • Configure [[L2 Services#VLAN Trunking Protocol|VTP]]. Use WSA2025 for the domain.
en
conf t
vtp mode off
vtp domain WSA2025
end
wr
  • Set VLAN interfaces using [[L2 Services#VLAN Interfaces|this]] and set the IP according to [[Cisco Environment#IP Configuration|table]].
en
conf t
vlan 100
name SERVER
vlan 101
name CLIENT_1
vlan 102
name CLIENT_2
vlan 103
name MGMT
vlan 888
name Native
vlan 150
name VOIP
exit

int vlan 100
no sh
int vlan 101
no sh
int vlan 102
no sh
int vlan 103
no sh
ip add 10.10.103.1 255.255.255.0

end
wr
  • Configure access ports for g0/0 and g0/3. Configure [[L2 Services#Spanning-tree|spanning-tree]].
en
conf t

spanning-tree mode rapid-pvst
int range g0/0,g0/3
switchport mode access
int g0/0
switchport access vlan 101 # Client VLAN
int g0/3
switchport access vlan 100 # Server VLAN
end
wr
  • Configure g0/1-2 as trunk ports:
en
conf t

int range g0/1-2
no sh
switchport trunk encapsulation dot1q
switchport mode trunk
switchport trunk native vlan 888

end
wr
  • Configure Port Security.
enable
conf t

logging buffered 64000

# HQ1-CLI1 access
int g0/0
switchport port-security
# Limit to VOIP phone and Client PC (2 unique devices)
switchport port-security maximum 2
switchport port-security violation shutdown
switchport port-security mac-address sticky
exit

errdisable recovery cause psecure-violation
errdisable recovery cause security-violation
errdisable recovery interval 180

end
wr

enable

permit ip 10.10.102.0 0.0.0.255 host 10.10.100.101

permit ip 10.1.102.0 0.0.0.255 host 10.10.100.101

permit ip host 10.10.100.101 10.11.102.0 0.0.0.255
permit ip host 10.10.100.101 10.1.102.0 0.0.0.255
permit ip host 10.10.100.101 10.2.102.0 0.0.0.255
exit

# Switch local SVI and HSRP IP (Considered as local. ACLs do not apply)
vlan access-map BLOCK_102 10
match ip address V102
action drop
exit

# Allow implicit drop
vlan access-map BLOCK_102
action forward

# Apply Access-map
vlan filter BLOCK_102 vlan-list 100,102

end

docs.text:
• Execute [[Common Configs]] and secure [[Security Services#SSH|SSH]].
enable
conf t
clock timezone UTC +8
clock summer-time PH recurring last Sun Mar 2:00 last Sun Oct 3:00

enable algorithm-type scrypt secret Skill39@Manila
username admin privilege 15 algorithm-type scrypt secret Skill39@Manila

no ip domain-lookup

ip domain-name wsa2025.net
crypto key generate rsa modulus 2048
ip ssh version 2
ip ssh server algorithm mac hmac-sha2-256 hmac-sha2-512

line console 0
login local
exec-timeout 0 0
line vty 0 4
login local
exec-timeout 0 0
logging synchronous
transport input ssh

end
write memory
  • Confirm preconfigured IPs based on the [[Cisco Environment#IP Configuration|table]].
  • Configure [[L3 Services - IPv4 and HSRP#Border Gateway Protocol (BGP)|BGP]].
en
conf t

# Create Prefix-list + route-map ISPV4_EXPORT
ip prefix-list SUMMARY_VLAN seq 5 permit 10.10.100.0/22
ip prefix-list SUMMARY_VLAN seq 10 permit 10.11.100.0/22
route-map ISPV4_EXPORT permit 10
match ip address prefix-list SUMMARY_VLAN
set metric 200 # Lower is preferred
exit

# ISP Prefixes, IR1 prefer
ip prefix-list ISP_PREFIX seq 5 permit 198.51.100.0/24
ip prefix-list ISP_PREFIX seq 10 permit 203.0.113.0/24

# Prioritize ISP_PREFIX to route in IR1
route-map IR1_PREFER permit 10
match ip address prefix-list ISP_PREFIX
set local-preference 300 # Higher is preferred, default value is 100
exit

# Permit other routes with default local-preference 100 (IR2 failover)
route-map IR1_PREFER permit 20
exit

router bgp 65000.3
bgp asnotation dot
bgp confederation identifier 65000
bgp confederation peers 65000.1

neighbor 192.0.2.101 remote-as 65000.1
neighbor 192.0.2.101 timers 10 30
neighbor 192.0.2.101 password Skill39@Manila
neighbor 192.0.2.101 route-map IR1_PREFER in
neighbor 192.0.2.101 route-map ISPV4_EXPORT out

neighbor WSA2025 peer-group
neighbor WSA2025 remote-as 65000.3
neighbor WSA2025 timers 10 30
neighbor WSA2025 password Skill39@Manila
neighbor WSA2025 update-source lo1
neighbor 10.10.0.11 peer-group WSA2025

network 10.10.100.0 mask 255.255.252.0
network 10.11.100.0 mask 255.255.252.0
aggregate-address 10.10.100.0 255.255.252.0 summary-only
aggregate-address 10.11.100.0 255.255.252.0 summary-only

end
wr
  • Configure [[L3 Services - IPv4 and HSRP#Open Shortest Path First (OSPF)|OSPF]].
en
conf t

# ISP_PREFIX for OSPF redistribution
route-map BGP_OSPF permit 10
match ip address prefix-list ISP_PREFIX
exit

router ospf 100
router-id 10.10.0.1
network 10.10.0.1 0.0.0.0 area 0
network 10.10.0.104 0.0.0.3 area 0
network 10.10.0.108 0.0.0.3 area 0

passive-interface default
no passive-interface g0/1
no passive-interface g0/2

default-information originate metric 5000 metric-type 2

# Redistribute learned routes from BGP
redistribute bgp 65000.3 route-map BGP_OSPF
exit

int range g0/1-2
ip ospf network point-to-point

end
wr
  • Configure NAT.
enable
configure terminal

ip access-list standard VLAN101-102
permit 10.1.101.0 0.0.0.255
permit 10.1.102.0 0.0.0.255
permit 10.2.101.0 0.0.0.255
permit 10.2.102.0 0.0.0.255
permit 10.10.101.0 0.0.0.255
permit 10.10.102.0 0.0.0.255
permit 10.11.101.0 0.0.0.255
permit 10.11.102.0 0.0.0.255
exit

ip nat pool IR1_POOL 192.0.2.104 192.0.2.110 netmask 255.255.255.240
ip nat inside source list VLAN101-102 pool IR1_POOL overload

# HQ1-SRV1
ip nat inside source static 10.10.100.101 192.0.2.99

int g0/3
ip nat outside

int range g0/1-2
ip nat inside

end
wr

line vty 0 4

exec-timeout 0 0

neighbor WSA2025 update-source lo1
neighbor 10.10.0.11 peer-group WSA2025
network 10.10.100.0 mask 255.255.252.0
network 10.11.100.0 mask 255.255.252.0
aggregate-address 10.10.100.0 255.255.252.0 summary-only
aggregate-address 10.11.100.0 255.255.252.0 summary-only
exit

route-map BGP_OSPF permit 10
match ip address prefix-list ISP_PREFIX
exit
router ospf 100
router-id 10.10.0.1
network 10.10.0.1 0.0.0.0 area 0
network 10.10.0.104 0.0.0.3 area 0
network 10.10.0.108 0.0.0.3 area 0
area 10 range 10.10.100.0 255.255.252.0
passive-interface default
no passive-interface g0/1
no passive-interface g0/2
default-information originate metric 5000 metric-type 2
redistribute bgp 65000.3 route-map BGP_OSPF
exit
int range g0/1-2
ip ospf network point-to-point
exit

ip access-list standard VLAN101-102
permit 10.1.101.0 0.0.0.255
permit 10.1.102.0 0.0.0.255
permit 10.2.101.0 0.0.0.255
permit 10.2.102.0 0.0.0.255
permit 10.10.101.0 0.0.0.255
permit 10.10.102.0 0.0.0.255
permit 10.11.101.0 0.0.0.255
permit 10.11.102.0 0.0.0.255
exit
ip nat pool IR1_POOL 192.0.2.104 192.0.2.110 netmask 255.255.255.240
ip nat inside source list VLAN101-102 pool IR1_POOL overload
ip nat inside source static 10.10.100.101 192.0.2.99
int g0/3
ip nat outside
int range g0/1-2
ip nat inside
exit

ntp server 192.0.2.101 prefer iburst
ntp master 10

crypto key generate rsa modulus 2048
ip ssh version 2
ip ssh server algorithm mac hmac-sha2-256 hmac-sha2-512
ip access-list standard SSH_ACL
permit host 10.10.100.101
line vty 0 4
login local
transport input ssh
exec-timeout 0 0
access-class SSH_ACL in

end
wr

docs.text:
• Execute [[Common Configs]].
enable
conf t
clock timezone UTC +8
clock summer-time PH recurring last sun mar 2:00 last sun oct 3:00

enable algorithm-type scrypt secret Skill39@Manila
username admin privilege 15 algorithm-type scrypt secret Skill39@Manila

no ip domain-lookup

ip domain-name wsa2025.net
crypto key generate rsa modulus 2048
ip ssh version 2

line console 0
login local
exec-timeout 0 0
line vty 0 4
login local
exec-timeout 0 0
logging synchronous
transport input ssh

end
write memory
  • Configure [[L2 Services#VLAN Trunking Protocol|VTP]].
en
conf t
vtp mode off
vtp domain WSA2025
end
wr
  • Set [[L2 Services#VLAN Interfaces|VLAN Interfaces]] and set IP according to the [[Cisco Environment#IP Configuration|table]]. For [[Cisco Environment#VLANs|vlans]].
en
conf t
vlan 100
name SERVER
vlan 101
name CLIENT_1
vlan 102
name CLIENT_2
vlan 103
name MGMT
vlan 888
name Native
vlan 150
name VOIP
exit

int vlan 100
no sh
int vlan 101
ipv6 enable
no sh
int vlan 102
ipv6 enable
no sh
int vlan 103
no sh
ip add 10.11.103.1 255.255.255.0
end
wr
  • Configure access port for 0/0:
en
conf t
int g0/0
switchport mode access
switchport access vlan 102 # Client VLAN
no sh
end
wr
  • Configure trunk links for ports g0/1-2:
en
conf t
int range g0/1-2
no sh
switchport trunk encapsulation dot1q
switchport mode trunk
switchport trunk native vlan 888
end
wr
  • Configure [[L2 Services#Spanning-tree|spanning-tree]].
en
conf t
spanning-tree mode rapid-pvst
int range g0/0,g0/3
spanning-tree portfast
end
wr
  • Configure Port Security.
enable
conf t

logging buffered 64000

# HQ1-CLI1 access
int g0/0
switchport port-security
# Limit to VOIP phone and Client PC (2 unique devices)
switchport port-security maximum 2
switchport port-security violation shutdown
switchport port-security mac-address sticky
exit

errdisable recovery cause psecure-violation
errdisable recovery cause security-violation
errdisable recovery interval 180

end
wr

  • Confirm IPv4 and set IPv6 based on [[Cisco Environment#IP Configuration|IP Configuration]].
en
conf t

int g0/0
no sh
ipv6 add 2001:db8:0:212::1/64

int g0/1
no sh
ipv6 add 2001:db8:0:220::1/64

int g0/2
no sh
ipv6 add 2001:db8:0:224::1/64

int g0/3
no sh
ipv6 add 2001:db8:0:204::2/64

int lo1
no sh
ipv6 add 2001:db8:0:12::1/64

end
wr
  • Configure [[L3 Services - IPv4 and HSRP#Enhanced Interior Gateway Routing Protocol|EIGRP]]. Enable ipv6 unicast-routing.
en
conf t

# OSPF => EIGRP
ip prefix-list HQ1-SUBNETS seq 5 permit 10.10.0.0/29 le 32
ip prefix-list HQ1-SUBNETS seq 10 permit 10.10.0.104/30
ip prefix-list HQ1-SUBNETS seq 15 permit 10.10.0.108/30
ip prefix-list HQ1-SUBNETS seq 20 permit 10.10.0.112/30
ip prefix-list HQ1-SUBNETS seq 25 permit 10.10.0.116/30
ip prefix-list HQ1-SUBNETS seq 30 permit 10.10.0.120/30
ip prefix-list HQ1-SUBNETS seq 35 permit 10.10.0.124/30
ip prefix-list HQ1-SUBNETS seq 40 permit 10.10.0.128/30
ip prefix-list HQ1-SUBNETS seq 45 permit 10.10.0.132/30
ip prefix-list HQ1-SUBNETS seq 50 permit 10.10.0.136/30
ip prefix-list HQ1-SUBNETS seq 55 permit 10.10.0.140/30
ip prefix-list HQ1-SUBNETS seq 60 permit 10.10.100.0/22 le 24

# Summarized version
ip prefix-list HQ1-SUBNETS seq 5 permit 10.10.0.0/29 le 32
ip prefix-list HQ1-SUBNETS seq 10 permit 10.10.0.104/29 le 30
ip prefix-list HQ1-SUBNETS seq 15 permit 10.10.0.112/28 le 30
ip prefix-list HQ1-SUBNETS seq 20 permit 10.10.0.128/28 le 30
ip prefix-list HQ1-SUBNETS seq 25 permit 10.10.100.0/22 le 24
ip prefix-list HQ1-SUBNETS seq 30 permit 198.51.100.0/24
ip prefix-list HQ1-SUBNETS seq 35 permit 203.0.113.0/24
ip prefix-list HQ1-SUBNETS seq 40 permit 0.0.0.0/0

# Block tagged routes (Already advertised)
route-map HQ1-OSPF deny 10
match tag 34
match tag 12
exit

# Route map for tagging
route-map HQ1-OSPF permit 20
match ip address prefix-list HQ1-SUBNETS
set tag 12
exit

ipv6 unicast-routing
router eigrp WSA2025
address-family ipv4 autonomous-system 100
eigrp router-id 10.10.0.12
network 10.10.0.12 0.0.0.0
network 10.10.0.204 0.0.0.3
network 10.10.0.212 0.0.0.3
network 10.10.0.220 0.0.0.3
network 10.10.0.224 0.0.0.3

af-interface default
passive-interface
exit
af-interface g0/0
no passive-interface
exit
af-interface g0/1
no passive-interface
exit
af-interface g0/2
no passive-interface
exit
af-interface g0/3
no passive-interface
summary-address 10.11.100.0/22
exit

# g0/4 is implicitly ignored by not advertising its local p2p ospf network, thereby disabling it

topology base
distance eigrp 90 100
redistribute ospf 100 route-map HQ1-OSPF metric 1544 10000 255 1 1500
exit
exit

address-family ipv6 autonomous-system 100
eigrp router-id 10.10.0.12

af-interface default
passive-interface
exit
af-interface g0/0
no passive-interface
exit
af-interface g0/1
no passive-interface
exit
af-interface g0/2
no passive-interface
exit
af-interface g0/3
no passive-interface

end
wr
  • Configure OSPF.
en
conf t

#includes both HQ2,BR1,BR2 loopback IPs
ip prefix-list HQ2-SUBNETS seq 5 permit 10.10.0.0/27 le 32 

ip prefix-list HQ2-SUBNETS seq 10 permit 10.10.0.204/30
ip prefix-list HQ2-SUBNETS seq 15 permit 10.10.0.208/30
ip prefix-list HQ2-SUBNETS seq 20 permit 10.10.0.212/30
ip prefix-list HQ2-SUBNETS seq 25 permit 10.10.0.220/30
ip prefix-list HQ2-SUBNETS seq 30 permit 10.10.0.224/30
ip prefix-list HQ2-SUBNETS seq 35 permit 10.10.0.228/30
ip prefix-list HQ2-SUBNETS seq 40 permit 10.10.0.232/30
ip prefix-list HQ2-SUBNETS seq 45 permit 10.10.0.240/30
ip prefix-list HQ2-SUBNETS seq 50 permit 10.11.100.0/22 le 24

ip prefix-list HQ2-SUBNETS seq 65 permit 10.1.100.0/22
ip prefix-list HQ2-SUBNETS seq 65 permit 10.2.100.0/22

# Summarized version
ip prefix-list HQ2-SUBNETS seq 5 permit 10.10.0.0/27 le 32
ip prefix-list HQ2-SUBNETS seq 10 permit 10.11.100.0/22 le 24
ip prefix-list HQ2-SUBNETS seq 15 permit 10.1.100.0/22 le 24
ip prefix-list HQ2-SUBNETS seq 20 permit 10.2.100.0/22 le 24
# P2P summarized
ip prefix-list HQ2-SUBNETS seq 25 permit 10.10.0.192/26 le 30

# Block tagged routes (Already advertised)
route-map HQ1-OSPF deny 10
match tag 34
match tag 12
exit

route-map HQ2-EIGRP permit 20
match ip address prefix-list HQ2-SUBNETS
set tag 34
exit

router ospf 100
router-id 10.10.0.12
network 10.10.0.136 0.0.0.3 area 0
redistribute eigrp 100 route-map HQ2-EIGRP

passive-interface default
no passive-interface g0/4
exit

int g0/4
ip ospf network point-to-point
end

network 10.11.101.0 0.0.0.255
network 10.11.102.0 0.0.0.255

exit

exit

exit

int vlan102
ipv6 nd managed-config-flag
ipv6 dhcp server VLAN102
end

docs.text:
• Execute [[Common Configs]] and [[Security Services#SSH|SSH]].
enable
configure terminal
clock timezone UTC +8
clock summer-time PH recurring last sun mar 2:00 last sun oct 3:00

enable algorithm-type scrypt secret Skill39@Manila
username admin privilege 15 algorithm-type scrypt secret Skill39@Manila

no ip domain-lookup

ip domain-name wsa2025.net
crypto key generate rsa modulus 2048
ip ssh version 2
ip ssh server algorithm mac hmac-sha2-256 hmac-sha2-512

line con 0
login local
exec-timeout 0 0
line vty 0 4
login local
exec-timeout 0 0
logging synchronous
transport input ssh
end
write memory
  • Confirm IPv4 and set IPv6 [[Cisco Environment#IP Configuration|IP configuration]].
en
conf t

int g0/1
no sh
ipv6 add 2001:db8:0:204::1/64

int g0/2
no sh
ipv6 add 2001:db8:0:208::1/64

int lo1
no sh
ipv6 add 2001:db8:0:11::1/64

int tun0
no sh
ipv6 add 2001:db8:16:100::1/64

end
wr
  • Configure [[L3 Services - IPv4 and HSRP#Border Gateway Protocol (BGP)|BGP]]. 
en
conf t

ip prefix-list SUMMARY_VLAN seq 5 permit 10.10.100.0/22
ip prefix-list SUMMARY_VLAN seq 10 permit 10.11.100.0/22
route-map ISPV4_EXPORT permit 10
match ip address prefix-list SUMMARY_VLAN
set metric 100 # Lower than IR1
exit

# Learned routes from ISP BGP
ip prefix-list ISP_TRAFFIC seq 10 permit 0.0.0.0/0
route-map IR2_PREFER permit 10
match ip address prefix-list ISP_TRAFFIC
set local-preference 200 # Higher than IR1 default but lower than 198.51.100.0 and 203.0.113.0 prefixes
exit

router bgp 65000.3
bgp asnotation dot
bgp confederation identifier 65000
bgp confederation peers 65000.1

neighbor 192.0.2.201 remote-as 65000.1
neighbor 192.0.2.201 timers 10 30
neighbor 192.0.2.201 password Skill39@Manila
neighbor 192.0.2.201 route-map IR2_PREFER in
neighbor 192.0.2.201 route-map ISPV4_EXPORT out

neighbor WSA2025 peer-group
neighbor WSA2025 remote-as 65000.3
neighbor WSA2025 timers 10 30
neighbor WSA2025 password Skill39@Manila
neighbor WSA2025 update-source lo1
neighbor 10.10.0.1 peer-group WSA2025

network 10.10.100.0 mask 255.255.252.0
network 10.11.100.0 mask 255.255.252.0
aggregate-address 10.10.100.0 255.255.252.0 summary-only
aggregate-address 10.11.100.0 255.255.252.0 summary-only

end
wr
  • Configure [[L3 Services - IPv4 and HSRP#Enhanced Interior Gateway Routing Protocol|EIGRP]]. Enable ipv6 unicast-routing. 
en
conf t
ipv6 unicast-routing

router eigrp WSA2025
address-family ipv4 autonomous-system 100
eigrp router-id 10.10.0.11
network 10.10.0.11 0.0.0.0
network 10.10.0.204 0.0.0.3
network 10.10.0.208 0.0.0.3
network 172.16.100.0 0.0.0.255

topology base
# Advertise default and other routes received from ISP
redistribute bgp 65000.3 metric 1000000 1000 255 1 1500

af-interface default
passive-interface
exit
af-interface g0/1
no passive-interface
exit
af-interface g0/2
no passive-interface
exit
af-interface tun0
no passive-interface
# Allow re-advertising on the multi-point tunnel interface
no split-horizon 
# Allow spoke-to-spoke connectivity
no next-hop-self
exit
exit

address-family ipv6 autonomous-system 100
eigrp router-id 10.10.0.11

af-interface default
passive-interface
exit
af-interface g0/1
no passive-interface
exit
af-interface g0/2
no passive-interface
exit
af-interface tun0
no passive-interface

end
wr
  • Configure NAT
en
conf t

ip access-list standard VLAN101-102
permit 10.1.101.0 0.0.0.255
permit 10.1.102.0 0.0.0.255
permit 10.2.101.0 0.0.0.255
permit 10.2.102.0 0.0.0.255
permit 10.10.101.0 0.0.0.255
permit 10.10.102.0 0.0.0.255
permit 10.11.101.0 0.0.0.255
permit 10.11.102.0 0.0.0.255

ip nat pool IR2_POOL 192.0.2.193 192.0.2.199 netmask 255.255.255.240
ip nat inside source list VLAN101-102 pool IR2_POOL overload
ip nat inside source static 10.10.100.101 192.0.2.205

int g0/3
ip nat outside

int range g0/1-2,tun0
ip nat inside

end
write
  • Configure NHRP (Next Hop Redundancy Protocol).
en
configure terminal

interface tun0
ip nhrp authentication WSA2025
ip nhrp network-id 2025
ip nhrp map multicast dynamic

# Phase 3
ip nhrp redirect
tunnel source g0/3
tunnel mode gre multipoint

end
wr
  • Configure SSH
ena
conf t

crypto key generate rsa modulus 2048
ip ssh version 2
ip ssh server algorithm mac hmac-sha2-256 hmac-sha2-512

# SSH ACL
ip access-list standard SSH_ACL
permit host 10.10.100.101

line vty 0 4
login local
transport input ssh
exec-timeout 0 0
access-class SSH_ACL in

end
wr
  • SSH Client testing (HQ1-Server)
ssh -oKexAlgorithms=+diffie-hellman-group14-sha1 -oHostKeyAlgorithms=+ssh-rsa admin@10.10.0.1

vi .ssh/config
Host *
    KexAlgorithms diffie-hellman-group14-sha1
    HostKeyAlgorithms ssh-rsa
